Reviews.Title: Amaizing Clarity, Ease of Use, Can Replace My Still Canon
Reviews.Author: Howard E. Yosha "iam72hrstv"
Reviews.Content: Auto features, the level of zoom, and angle make for great pictures.  The focus and stable features are quick.  Plugging it into my Netbook was a breeze using the USB cable or using my flash drive.The Samsung Photo Software was not compatible with my HP Netbook running XP.  My Larger HP Notebook ran the software and it catalouges my many phone photos, still photo scans, and scanned documents.  The only weakness is the inability of the software run on systems less than Vista.This brand new model PL20 I found to be roughly comparable to a Nikon Coolpix.  The Samsung is quicker than the Nikon and the New Lithium Battery pack has a longer battery life the a Nikon using AA batteries.Extras I am looking to buy are not yet available on Amazon including a Samsung case for the PL20 and additional lithium ion battery pack.

Reviews.Title: Good choice
Reviews.Author: Reviewer
Reviews.Content: Good value for what I paid. Takes good picture. Very reliable. I have used other cameras but this is the best one for the price paid. Recommend it.

ProductInfo.Features:
14 megapixel image sensor.
27-135mm wide angle lens.
5x optical zoom.
720p HD movie recording.
Rechargeable Li-Ion Battery Pack.
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung PL20 PL20ZZBPS 14MP Wide Angle HD Digital Camera in Silver
